titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Thomas Michlovic Papers, 1978-2002 AIS.2002.04
titlestmt.author: Bryce R. Henry.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-12-14 08:38:11 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: The papers of Thomas A. Michlovic documents his career in the Pennsylvania House of Representatives (1977-2002). Materials are concentrated on the years between 1987 through 2001. The collection consists primarily of correspondence, campaign and election materials, legislative files, publications, photographs, and reports.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Thomas (Tom) A. Michlovic was born February 21, 1946 in Braddock, Pa. Michlovic served in the U.S. Army from 1967-1969. He received a B.A. in political science in 1972 and an M.A. in public administration in 1976, both from the University of Pittsburgh. In 1978 he was elected as a Democrat to the Pennsylvania House of Representatives for the 35th District. He remained in the House until his retirement in 2002. Since 2004 he has served on the Pennsylvania Securities Commission.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The original print finding aid, created by Kate Colligan and Trish Gillespie, sorted the collection into topical dividers. These divisions have been retained as subject sections for this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Thomas A. Michlovic Papers document his career in the Pennsylvania House of Representatives 35th District, 1977-2002. The bulk of the collection (1987-2001) is comprised primarily of correspondence, legislative bills, campaign/election materials, and files related to the 35th District borough, cities, and townships. Subject areas of concentration include: healthcare in general but strongly focused on mental health, industry and labor, lobbyists, taxes, and transportation.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Thomas A. Michlovic Papers, 1978-2002, AIS.2002.04, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Thomas A. Michlovic Papers, 1978-2002, AIS.2002.04, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Thomas A. Michlovic on September 26, 2002.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed and inventoried by Kate Colligan and Trish Gillespie in 2002. It was entered into Archivists' Toolkit by Bryce Henry in September 2011.
